title: The Shadows Breathe
description: Librarian Note: Alternate Cover Edition for ISBN10: 1492862894 / ISBN13: 9781492862895.Kara is a horse trainer with a gift for working with horses. But when her fellow trainer and beloved mentor suddenly has to leave, she faces a new trainer that she immediately distrusts. When her suspicions confirm that he's abusing the animals in his care, she makes a drastic decision to steal a mare to save her life. That decision starts a dangerous game that escalates into a journey that may cost her everything--even her life.
author: Kathleen Marentes
